game.name: Bakery Fun
game.description:
Is the cooking of new recipes on a daily basis your hobby? Does your kid love spending time with you when you prepare the food for your family? If yes, then Bakery Fun can be your final destination. In this brand new girls game, you as a player will get a chance to bake different types of cake recipes in multiple levels. Trying out all the recipes will help improve the culinary skills of your kid while also providing her with the best quality fun in a friendly environment.

All it takes adding the ingredients in the right combination to get the job done in each level. Choose from multiple ingredients including chocolate, fruits, jam, oil, flour, sugar and more in this HTML5 cooking game! Once it is done, then do not forget to choose the right temperature. Bake it for a few seconds and the amazing final result will be shown in front you shortly! The screen will show you all the ingredients when you click the play button. Add them one by one after following the instructions!

The best part is that you will find new recipes in each level. Pause your game anytime whenever you want in this cool food game. Do not bother in case if you are stuck on a certain level. Select the temperature as per your wish while making cake for you! Hey! You can also redo the whole recipe again in case if you mix the wrong ingredient to the bowl. Check out our extensive collection of free cooking games for girls and learn new food recipes every day!
